text:
[Verse]
Night falls quiet starts to glow
Stars above they steal the show
In the dark we let it go
Feel the rhythm nice and slow

[Verse 2]
City lights start to shimmer
Heartbeat fast the moments glimmer
Feet move quick no need to linger
Touch the sky with just one finger

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows all around
Feet can't seem to touch the ground
Spinning laughing lost in sound
Here our joy is always found

[Verse 3]
Moonlight shining on our face
In this dream we find our place
Time and space they leave no trace
In this dance a sweet embrace

[Verse 4]
Whispers in the evening air
Music flowing everywhere
Magic moments shared in pairs
As we lose our worldly cares

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows all around
Feet can't seem to touch the ground
Spinning laughing lost in sound
Here our joy is always found
title: Dancing Shadows
